title: michaelpopoola
author: michaelpopoola
content: Dandelion : Tomorrow's blockchain ready todaywebsite: https://dandelionnet.io/twitter : https://twitter.com/ddln_networkslinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/dandelionnetworks/Good or scam?

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: Should move to the discussion forum.

comments.author: FahriZah
comments.body: I think this is fully scams because any stable project never offering to you any donations and i already check-up thire twitter thire have only 119 twitter followers and no any recent tweets from project teams so never donate you anywhere without you justified 100% make sure so you can avoid this one i hope good for you.

comments.author: michaelpopoola
comments.body: Quote from: FahriZah on October 10, 2023, 05:42:21 PMI think this is fully scams because any stable project never offering to you any donations and i already check-up thire twitter thire have only 119 twitter followers and no any recent tweets from project teams so never donate you anywhere without you justified 100% make sure so you can avoid this one i hope good for you.Thank you very much

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Avoid. Look for something better to invest your time and money in.I have just read through their homepage and there is nothing special they have to offer. Just one of the so many copycats of Ethereum and so old blockchains. These projects are just created to grab money from you newbies in exchange for useless tokens.

comments.author: hitsnorth
comments.body: Even if it's not a scam it doesn't seem like it's worth money or attention. Do what you want, buy I'll just avoid it.

comments.author: taunt28hg
comments.body: TW has 121 followers, this might be the early stage of the project. I have checked their website, and it seems like they want to build a new blockchain. Whether it's a scam or not is still unknown; it's only when investors join the project and potentially lose money that people might label it as a scam.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: There's a famous quote, and it states that "A project can't be called a scam until it will be one." Well, this might not be applicable to all projects, but we can't say that a project is a scam until it will not scam others. I know, I know that there might be some who will be against me, but I don't want to judge things very early. I'm not saying that the project is a scam though, but at the same time, I don't want to say that it doesn't because... who knows. I mean I still remember when the term NFT has been called a scam at first because it's a new concept. This project isn't a new concept though because it's all about DAPPs base on their website. Nevertheless, we investors always have this kind of thinking that whenever we see a new crypto project, we always think that it's a scam even though we don't have any evidences to support it.Overall, there are many better projects out there OP that's already established. It would be better for you to put your money there.

comments.author: cantruang8h1
comments.body: There are many projects like these out there, and I haven't been interested in such projects for a long time. They simply sell tokens with promises, and investors may end up trading their money for worthless tokens.

comments.author: justdimin
comments.body: Quote from: cantruang8h1 on October 16, 2023, 08:04:40 AMThere are many projects like these out there, and I haven't been interested in such projects for a long time. They simply sell tokens with promises, and investors may end up trading their money for worthless tokens.IDK if the project the OP is talkin about is a scam or not but it's great to hear those words from you despite being a newbie. It shows that you don't easily trust a random project that just pop up in the corner like a mushroom. I thought all newbies are only about being a shill.For us to be sure if a project is worthy or not, we should always do our research first. It's only free of cost. It's just that it can only take some of our precious time which others may not like because they are either lazy or busy but they shouldn't gamble instead. It would be better if they will only invest their money in the good and well-known coins because their chance for them to profit are always high on those coins.

comments.author: Traderbtcc
comments.body: Stay out of such projects, this right here isn’t a serious project, might even be a scam cause why not . A project with Twitter not up to 1k isn’t serious to me, and also they have noting different to offer so what will make them stand out? Probably nothing . As a newbie stick to well known projects it will help u a lot. Most of these new projects won’t survive long in the Market.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: I didn't investigate so much about the project nor do I have the capacity to go into the tiny details of the big claims of this project, but when I visited their website it's like I'm taken back to the times of the ICO. You must know that 99% of those projects are already dead. So if you have so much money and you investigated the potentials of this project and you're convinced, spend a very little amount for it. But for somebody who's got very limited finances, stay away. It may not be a scam but probably not good enough to succeed big-time. In other words, not worth it.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: I see danger ahead of those that will invest their resources in this new project, because there are some signs I noticed from the project that will make investors to regret at the end of the project. I believe, there are favourable projects in the community you can invest now and have something good to achieve before the end of this year but you have to carry out your research to see those favourable projects in the community. I think, there are still old projects you can invest in this season and you will be safe for such project, because their teams are very strong to make things happen for the favour of their investors and for other investors to show more interest in the future.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: cantruang8h1 on October 16, 2023, 08:04:40 AMThere are many projects like these out there, and I haven't been interested in such projects for a long time. They simply sell tokens with promises, and investors may end up trading their money for worthless tokens.Well thats like thousands of projects out there and its inevitable to see these daily. But you could ignore or research is. Sometimes a gold can be found on these but make sure to review all and not just put up money. OP's post about the project is nothing special as Ive reviewed it and sounds very simple and same with previous one. Not sure if its a scam but typically not a project you are gonna go and put some $100 to $1k bucks.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Nice OP, asking and there are the details including the links to their social media accounts.  I will not invest in projects like this and you're just giving everyone your social media links and the curious ones will visit them but I won't. You might be part of the team of this project and that's all you need to do is to make everyone curious and let them see what they think about the project by starting this thread. It can or cannot be a scam, but whatever it is, projects like this we don't have an idea if they'll stay longer or not on this market.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: We cannot say for sure that it is a good project or even a scam but certainly it is one of the projects that is full of risks because in the end all new projects are full of risks considering that for now a lot of shitcoins are always doing the same scheme by just pumping and dumping and sometimes even hanging projects that end up with scams and worthlessness are commonplace.So instead of expecting things like if you really intend to invest then it is better to look for something more bona fide and promising. You can get it in bitcoin not others even though there are risks too but at least this will provide more comfort than unclear projects like this.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Raflesia on October 20, 2023, 09:45:41 PMWe cannot say for sure that it is a good project or even a scam but certainly it is one of the projects that is full of risks because in the end all new projects are full of risks considering that for now a lot of shitcoins are always doing the same scheme by just pumping and dumping and sometimes even hanging projects that end up with scams and worthlessness are commonplace.So instead of expecting things like if you really intend to invest then it is better to look for something more bona fide and promising. You can get it in bitcoin not others even though there are risks too but at least this will provide more comfort than unclear projects like this.And by that logic the moment we cannot really say if a project is good or not then we need to stay away from it, there are so many coins on the market that there is not any point in trying to take a dumb risk for any coin out there, since we must remember that our funds are limited and we need to try to make the most out of them, and investing in a coin that could go either way does not seem like the most efficient use we could give to our money.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 10, 2023, 11:20:15 PMAvoid. Look for something better to invest your time and money in.Yes, and I'm not sure if I have heard this project before. But if I'm the OP, I would rather look for other solid coins already in the market, like in the top 10 to put my money with. I don't like to risk on something that might pull a rug pull later. Not a financial advise, but we are just talking about the experience we had, just saying.Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 10, 2023, 11:20:15 PMI have just read through their homepage and there is nothing special they have to offer. Just one of the so many copycats of Ethereum and so old blockchains. These projects are just created to grab money from you newbies in exchange for useless tokens.Since the boom of projects in 2017, we have seen a lot of copy cat Ethereum projects, even some of them are being back up by the Chinese. So yes in the beginning it was good, however, majority of the projects died already. And then the cycle continues, 2019-2020, there was another boom of projects trying to compete with Ethereum. Maybe some of them still exists today. But it doesn't mean that they can really topple Ethereum or even if they are better that Ethereum right now, I think Ethereum will still take the top spot as the best altcoins in terms of investment.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Quote from: Silberman on October 22, 2023, 09:33:12 AMQuote from: Raflesia on October 20, 2023, 09:45:41 PMWe cannot say for sure that it is a good project or even a scam but certainly it is one of the projects that is full of risks because in the end all new projects are full of risks considering that for now a lot of shitcoins are always doing the same scheme by just pumping and dumping and sometimes even hanging projects that end up with scams and worthlessness are commonplace.So instead of expecting things like if you really intend to invest then it is better to look for something more bona fide and promising. You can get it in bitcoin not others even though there are risks too but at least this will provide more comfort than unclear projects like this.And by that logic the moment we cannot really say if a project is good or not then we need to stay away from it, there are so many coins on the market that there is not any point in trying to take a dumb risk for any coin out there, since we must remember that our funds are limited and we need to try to make the most out of them, and investing in a coin that could go either way does not seem like the most efficient use we could give to our money.Although it will all depend on the choice of each person because of course they have their own research and beliefs about this, but if you really want to be safe from large risks, avoiding projects like this must be done because in the end we also have to realize that the risk of losses in projects like this is far greater than the benefits they have. Unless it is ready to lose then I will not have a problem with this but for me personally I will not try things like this because in my opinion this is not worth it even though I do not judge this project bad but still to be in altcoins or tokens like this I will not do it because what I do is investment not gambling.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: It seems like that the trend to issue a new scam project has become popular trend again these days. This is a shitty project with only a few followers. Look at what it was explaining in the site. It's pure garbage project. I kinda feel that this is 99% scam project. If you were investors and then you will not be stupid enough to use this shitty project. Just ignore and move on. There have been many legit projects in the website and how can you try to belive this shit? Be a smart investors and never try to a new shit being made by scammer like that. Scammer paid domain and frontend to scam the users these days. Just stay away from there. A new project offered a too good to be true promise has been indicated to be a new scam.
